attributes.action: To encourage the UK government to offer financial.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK hospitality industry employed around 3 millions people, which represents around 9% of the UK workforce. By employment, it is the UK's fourth-largest industry. The most jobs in the industry are found in London (around 500,000). 
If the hospitality sector goes down it will definitely have a major negative effect on the country economy.
attributes.background: We want the UK government to provide economic assistance to hospitality staff employed affected by the financial loss.
